description:
For the highest level of advocacy and support possible for your personal injury or wrongful death claim, you can turn to Schlapprizzi Attorneys at Law in St. Louis, Missouri, for help.
Family owned and operated, our law firm has become the trusted source for those throughout the St. Louis metro region and the surrounding areas of Illinois who are struggling from the effects of an accident caused by someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.
A staple of our community for more than 30 years, we have achieved unprecedented success fighting on behalf of the rights and entitlements of innocent accident victims and their families. As a result of our success, we have earned membership into the Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum, and we have received widespread recognition from our clients and peers alike as one of the top personal injury practices in the country.
Whether your claim is the result of medical malpractice, a motor vehicle accident, a defective product or any other preventable tragedy, you can rely on the attorneys at our law firm to work to do what is necessary to help you obtain the maximum amount of compensation possible for your injuries and losses, as well as for your pain and suffering.
To take advantage of our free initial consultation and discover how Schlapprizzi Attorneys at Law can best assist you in your time of need, we invite you to contact our law office to schedule an appointment.
